title: Inline Bundle Validation Gate
goal: Keep the Save button disabled until bundle name and price validate, mirroring the Bundle->Add rules.
environment: HTML + Vanilla JavaScript + Firebase + Jest + jsdom

specs.title: SaveBlockedUntilValid
specs.given: An inline bundle context exists with at least one selected book.
specs.when: bundleName is blank/whitespace or bundlePriceMinor is missing.
specs.then: saveBundle does not call adapters.saveBundle, validationErrors surface per field, and isSaving remains false.

specs.title: ValidationClearsOnValidFields
specs.given: Selected books and valid bundleName + bundlePriceMinor are present.
specs.when: saveBundle runs with a trimmed bundleName and positive bundlePriceMinor.
specs.then: adapters.saveBundle receives the clean payload (bundleId, bundleName, bundlePriceMinor, bookIds) and validationErrors clear.

specs.title: IdempotentSaveWhileBusy
specs.given: A saveBundle call is in flight.
specs.when: saveBundle is invoked again before the prior promise resolves.
specs.then: Only one adapters.saveBundle call occurs and isSaving flips back to false after the first promise resolves.

changeNotes: Save flow trims bundle name, requires positive price, exposes validationErrors, and keeps saveBundle idempotent while pending.
